tech_news.description: The 13-inch M4 MacBook Air is on sale at multiple retailers for $749 for Black Friday, which remains its lowest price to date. The 15-inch model is on sale, too.

tech_news.description: RAM memory isn’t cheap right now, so instead of getting parts piecemeal, perhaps buying a prebuilt gaming PC from Walmart or Best Buy for Black Friday is the move.
